experiment.name: mom6_solo_compile
experiment.description: Make the executable for solo ocean experiments.

component.name: mom6
component.paths: mom6/src/MOM6/config_src/dynamic mom6/src/MOM6/config_src/solo_driver mom6/src/MOM6/src/*/ mom6/src/MOM6/src/*/*/ mom6/src/MOM6/pkg/CVMix-src/include ocean_shared/generic_tracers ocean_shared/mocsy/src

source.csh:
pushd ocean_shared git submodule init mocsy git submodule update popd
git clone -b $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) https://github.com/wrongkindofdoctor/MOM6-examples.git mom6 pushd mom6 git submodule init src/MOM6 git submodule update #This gets the right version of submodules git clone --recursive https://github.com/wrongkindofdoctor/MOM6.git src/MOM6
popd
pushd mom6 git clone https://github.com/wrongkindofdoctor/MOM6-examples.git set platform_domain = `perl -T -e "use Net::Domain(hostdomain) ; print hostdomain"` if ("${platform_domain}" =~ *"gfdl.noaa.gov"* ) then ln -sf /archive/gold/datasets .datasets else ln -s /lustre/f2/pdata/gfdl/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets endif popd
test -e mom6/.datasets if ($status != 0) then echo ""; echo "" ; echo " WARNING: .datasets link in MOM6 examples directory is invalid"; echo ""; echo "" endif

input.csh:
#------------------------------------------ ## Find out whether to restart.
if ( $currentSeg == 1 ) then set restart_flag = 'n' else set restart_flag = 'r' endif
cd $work ## Run the model #------------------------------------------ #Niki: Add if( $months > 0 ) ## Format existing diagTable to use for monthly rather than daily output if ( $months > 0 ) then sed -i -e 's/\"days\",1/\"months\",1/g' diag_table endif

postProcess.csh:
cd $work #Save the last line of ocean.stats without the first (step number) column as a signature of MOM6 answers tail -1 ocean.stats | cut -c8- > RESTART/$enddate.ocean.stats.res #Save the whole ocean.stats under ascii/ mv ocean.stats $enddate.ocean.stats mv ocean.stats.nc $enddate.ocean.stats.nc
#Make a directory to trick FRE to pick up and archive in ascii mkdir extra.results
mv *velocity_truncations CPU_stats MOM_parameter_doc* extra.results/ #Make perftools report and trick FRE to archive them ls *.xf if ( ! $status ) then module load perftools pat_report $executable:t+*.xf > extra.results/pat_report.out endif mv $executable:t+* extra.results/

cd $work #Save the last line of ocean.stats without the first (step number) column as a signature of MOM6 answers tail -1 ocean.stats | cut -c8- > RESTART/$enddate.ocean.stats.res #Save the whole ocean.stats under ascii/ mv ocean.stats $enddate.ocean.stats mv ocean.stats.nc $enddate.ocean.stats.nc

#NOT TO BE USED WITH REGULAR FRE RUNS!! ONLY FOR MOM6 DEVELOPERS UNIT TESTING
set compiler = `echo $platform | sed 's/ncrc3\.//' | sed 's/[0-9]\+//'`
#Save the output files for later review set mydate = `date "+%Y%m%d%H%M%S"` set thisrun = results.$platform.$target.$mydate mkdir $thisrun \rm latest_run.$platform.$target ln -s $thisrun latest_run.$platform.$target
diff ocean.stats ocean.stats.$compiler > $thisrun/diff if ( $status == 0 ) then touch PASSED_$platform.$target.$mydate echo "ANSWERS MATCH" echo "${PWD}/${thisrun} PASS" > $stateDir/../../status else if ( $?MPI_FAIL ) then touch CRASHED_$platform.$target.$mydate echo "CRASHED" echo "${PWD}/${thisrun} CRASH" > $stateDir/../../status else touch FAILED_$platform.$target.$mydate echo "ANSWERS DIFFER" echo "${PWD}/${thisrun} FAIL" > $stateDir/../../status endif endif #cp ocean.stats ocean.stats.$compiler #This would affect the diff status of the next run cp MOM_parameter_doc* $thisrun/ mv RESTART ocean.stats *.out *.nc *.nc.* *velocity_truncations CPU_stats core $thisrun/
#Exit here. The rest is of no use to mom6 developers and unit testers exit 0

input.csh:
#------------------------------------------ ## Find out whether to restart.
if ( $currentSeg == 1 ) then set restart_flag = 'n' else set restart_flag = 'r' endif
cd $work/INPUT cpget MOM_override2 cat >> MOM_override2 << OVERRIDE_EOF #override define INPUTDIR "INPUT" #override define COORD_FILE "isopyc_coords.nc" !not needed for _z experiments OVERRIDE_EOF
cd $work ## Run the model #------------------------------------------

postProcess.csh: cd $work #Save the last line of ocean.stats without the first (step number) column as a signature of MOM6 answers tail -1 ocean.stats | cut -c8- > RESTART/$enddate.ocean.stats.res #Save the whole ocean.stats under ascii/ mv ocean.stats $enddate.ocean.stats mv ocean.stats.nc $enddate.ocean.stats.nc

input.namelist: months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'

experiment.name: mom6_solo_circle_obcs
experiment.description: FATAL from PE 25: Symmetric memory must be used when APPLY_OBC_U_FLATHER_WEST or APPLY_OBC_V_FLATHER_SOUTH is true. config_src/dynamic_symmetric

source.csh:
git clone -b $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/MOM6-examples.git mom6 pushd mom6 git submodule init src/MOM6 git clone --recursive https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/MOM6.git src/MOM6 git submodule update popd
pushd mom6 set platform_domain = `perl -T -e "use Net::Domain(hostdomain) ; print hostdomain"` if ("${platform_domain}" =~ *"gfdl.noaa.gov"* ) then ln -sf /archive/gold/datasets .datasets else ln -s /lustre/f2/pdata/gfdl/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets
endif popd
test -e mom6/.datasets if ($status != 0) then echo ""; echo "" ; echo " WARNING: .datasets link in MOM6 examples directory is invalid"; echo ""; echo "" endif

input.namelist: months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
input.csh:
cd $workDir/INPUT cat > MOM_override << MOM_OVERRIDE_EOF NIGLOBAL = 36 NJGLOBAL = 27
MOM_OVERRIDE_EOF

cat > $workDir/INPUT/UNSPLIT_override << OVERRIDE_EOF #override undef SPLIT #override define DT 400.0 OVERRIDE_EOF
#------------------------------------------ ## Find out whether to restart.
if ( $currentSeg == 1 ) then set restart_flag = 'n' else set restart_flag = 'r' endif cd $work ## Run the model #------------------------------------------

experiment.name: mom6_solo_DOME
experiment.description: DOME_static test case. The DOME_static project aims to provide standard procedures to evaluate and compare the representation of overflow processes in large-scale circulation models, which can be made available to the modelling comunity.

input.namelist: months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'

source.csh: echo "No need to checkout any new source code for this component!"

input.namelist: months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'

experiment.name: mom6_solo_global_ALE_z_noRTS1
experiment.description: MOM6 wiki: http://wiki.gfdl.noaa.gov/index.php/MOM6 solo global 1 degree z

input.namelist: months = $months days = $days date_init = 1,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'julian'
input.diagTable:
$name 1 1 1 0 0 0 ## output files "ocean_daily", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time" "ocean_month", 1, "months", 1, "days", "time" "ocean_annual", 12, "months", 1, "days", "time" "ocean_static", -1, "months", 1, "days", "time" "_Drake_passage", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time" "_Denmark_Strait", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time" "_Iceland_Norway", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time" "_Gibraltar_Strait", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time" "_Bering_Strait", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time" "_Agulhas_section", 1, "days", 1, "days", "time"

experiment.name: mom6_solo_DOME_static
experiment.description: DOME_static test case. The DOME_static project aims to provide standard procedures to evaluate and compare the representation of overflow processes in large-scale circulation models, which can be made available to the modelling comunity.
